statements: SELECT * FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT schedule_id, room_name, lighting_time FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE schedule_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE room_name = 'Bedroom' ORDER BY lighting_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, room_name, blind_open_time FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE blind_open_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT room_name, lighting_time, blind_open_time FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule ORDER BY room_name, blind_open_time;
SELECT * FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT schedule_id, room_name FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE lighting_time > '08:00:00' AND blind_open_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT room_name, lighting_time, blind_open_time FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE room_name LIKE 'Bedroom%' ORDER BY lighting_time;
SELECT DISTINCT room_name FROM LightingAndBlindsSchedule WHERE blind_open_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE action_type = 'lighting';
SELECT routine_name, execution_time FROM routines ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_name = 'Daily Cleaning'
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT routine_name, action_type, execution_time FROM routines WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000')
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time FROM schedules WHERE end_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT routine_name, device_type FROM routines WHERE action = 'Turn On';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Plug';
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type='computer';
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT routine_id, routine_name, device_type, action FROM routines WHERE device_type='lamp' ORDER BY routine_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT room_name, light_type, start_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE end_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT id, routine_name, frequency FROM daily_routines ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT description FROM daily_routines WHERE routine_name = 'Morning Routine'
SELECT user_id, theme_color, default_view FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT id, room_name, start_time, end_time FROM blinds_schedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT routine_name, description FROM daily_routines WHERE frequency = 'Daily' ORDER BY routine_name DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, default_view FROM user_preferences WHERE notifications = TRUE AND theme_color = 'Dark';
SELECT id, room_name, light_type, start_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE end_time > '18:00:00' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules_schedule;
SELECT id, name, start_time FROM schedules_schedule;
SELECT end_time, name, id FROM schedules_schedule;
SELECT * FROM routines_routine WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT id, name, description FROM routines_routine ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules_schedule;
SELECT name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules_schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM routines_routine WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT id, device_name, device_type, brightness FROM lighting_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT s.name AS schedule_name, r.name AS routine_name, r.description FROM schedules_schedule s JOIN schedule_routine_mapping m ON s.id = m.schedule_id JOIN routines_routine r ON m.routine_id = r.id;
